data.message: There is someone who wanted to hack my facebook account since yesterday so far I do not know why he wants to make piracy thank you very much.

replies.message: Hi Hamza. We provide several tools and tips for you to keep your account safe. You can learn all about them on Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2gL00Rt. Hope this helps! -Nick

Thank you very much my loyal friend. EVERY time I will create a new Facebook account. But now I will change my pictures to not know me next time. He points out to me a null report. Now I am well. I wish you a healthy and happy day with your comrades for your favorable response. THANKS
You're very welcome, Hamza. Have a great day! -Nick
